title: A Shelter Full of Cats
description:
Everyone can be a hero ! Help a cat rescuer take care of her rescuees and root for their adoption! Every cat deserves a chance to be loved. ❤️ OneShot: World Machine Edition
A Shelter Full of Cats is a hidden object game set in a cat shelter specially designed for cats with special needs. Join the Shelter’s manager, Hannah , as she prepares a charity party to help these cats find their forever homes. Let’s show that love has no boundaries!

system_requirements.Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
